message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item carries significant value to me, and I believe it holds even greater value for you based on your preferences. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $120. I trust that you will find its features and benefits to be well worth this investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this purchase.
